channel.title: Re-introduce present tutorial section
channel.description: who agree's, we should bring back the old tutorial section that people can understand and people can freely post.

item.title: Re-introduce present tutorial section
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

M.dog isn’t even irish lol.

On topic:

The tutorial section we have at the moment is perfectly fine. There are no shitty tutorials for people to flame at and not learn anything from.

Read full topic

item.title: Re-introduce present tutorial section
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

jc22493:

Yep, I just don’t like racist Irish fags.

Not everyone from ireland is racist. I’m from ireland and i’m not racist, nor am I a fag.
Pure ess had no right to say that, but don’t label him because hes irish, and if you’re going
to slag ireland and you’re from america, I wouldn’t use the word ‘fag’, at all.
Wether he realises it or not china is helping everyone’s economies, the real men are those
who work in factories in my opinion, not the poshies who sit with their hands in their pockets,
thinking their better than everyone else because they we’re born into rich families.

On the subject of the Tutorial section, I wrote a tutorial yesterday, which took me ages, it was
how to get a working compiler, and i went into loads of detail, even posted a colour guide, and a list
of batch commands, and explained what happens when you compile etc. I’m guessing It didn’t even get approved because someone had already ‘skimmed’ over the topic of working compilers in a server tutorial. I think it should stay the way it is but all worthy tutorials should be posted in a list inside a sticky topic?

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Re-introduce present tutorial section
item.dc:creator: @pure_ess_ftw pure ess ftw
item.description:
@pure_ess_ftw wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:18, topic:280809”][quote author=pure ess ftw link=topic=370868.msg2804413#msg2804413 date=1243637960]

No. We will continue to police all tutorials, and only allow the ones that we see fit to be publicly viewable.

I just had to send a message to all MoparScape mods asking them if they could pitch in with the tutorials, as I do around 10 a day alone.

Stop complaining…

Stop complaining because he has to take on an atrocious amount of work compared to other moderators? (Excluding Taharok.)

And you would know how much work it is how? You saying that it is an atrocious amount of work is like saying building a shuttle to Mars is hard. Do you have any experience? No, you’re just going off what some other fuck said.

And who’s statement am I going off of? I love how kids like you think you’re all tough over the internet.

Coming from the kid who thinks he is the biggest badass of all.

Newty… Go jump in a hole.

Go make Nikes…

Was that supposed to be funny? o.O

supposed to say thatyou are asian and work in factories for money next to nothing…
[/quote]
Fuck you. You’re no better than m.dog, letting out your anger over the internet. ;)[/quote]
just explaining what he ment… sorry to offend you in any way. I had no anger when i posted, and i will have no anger when i post. And it is seeming like YOU do though, and trying to cover it up.

Read full topic
